Name: Import & Export HAR file
Description: Can I import and export network activity to a HAR file?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, use the **Up** (↑) and **Down** (↓) arrow buttons in the toolbar to **Import** and **Export** all the network activity into a HAR file.
Chrome.Name: Import & Export HAR file

Edge.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, use the **Up** (↑) and **Down** (↓) arrow buttons in the toolbar to **Import** and **Export** all the network activity into a HAR file.
Edge.Name: Import & Export HAR file

Opera.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, use the **Up** (↑) and **Down** (↓) arrow buttons in the toolbar to **Import** and **Export** all the network activity into a HAR file.
Opera.Name: Import & Export HAR file
